lead_paragraph: Borussia Dortmund will be without central defender Neven Subotic for the rest of their treble-chasing season after the Serbian was diagnosed with thrombosis in his arm, coach Thomas Tuchel said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Dortmund Defender Subotic Out for Rest of Season
headline.main: Dortmund Defender Subotic Out for Rest of Season

snippet: Borussia Dortmund will be without central defender Neven Subotic for the rest of their treble-chasing season after the Serbian was diagnosed with thrombosis in his arm, coach Thomas Tuchel said on Friday....
